data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 13537, Version Hash: a4eee6d05462fb4797eeb0327ef3180521efee85
data.actual_result: The popup only shows once you're out of full screen, if you clicked the camera button 4 times you'll get 4 popups, etc.
data.expected_result: A popup explaining there's no camera during full screen
data.short_description: While someone is sharing screens if you go into full screen and have no camera plugged in clicking the camera button doesn't show the popup until you go out of full screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Get into a call with someone - Either you or them start sharing screens - Go into full screen - Click the camera button - Get out of full screen
